name: Street Fighter II MOVIE
overview: This Street Fighter game is based in the movie Street Fighter II the Movie, and the gameplay is not the usual fighting game, is just an interactive movie. The player takes the role of one of M. Bison cyborg soldiers that have to travel the world in search of the Street Fighter characters to gain their special combat technical moves and that way Bison will create an army of those invencible cyborgs. But Bison real objective is to capture a legendary street fighter called Ryu. To try to ruin Bison plans the interpol hired Chun-Li (their best agent) that quickly goes in search of the captain Guile who has a personal interest in kill Bison and here's where the game starts.
